dialogs.text: I decree that today is officially Block-your-local-bridge Day. Join me for a good cause.

choices.text: Can you move? I'm trying to get my ID card.
Maybe you shouldn't do that. It sounds very unproductive.

dialogs.text: Of course not, I'm doing a very important official business. This is clearly far more important than your ID card.
Hm. Maybe you're right. We have to block every bridge, not just local ones!

RevealResults17 You got that human to change their mind! Kind of. It looks like we'd better to stop trying to correct them on that, though. Hey, I have an idea! Remember those statistics on how friends might be able to influence each other to do... questionable things? Let's try convincing their friends first.
